definition: a piece of soft material that covers and protects an injured part of the body, to dress by covering or binding
details:
noun
- a piece of soft material that covers and protects an injured part of the body
= synonyms: patch
verb
- to dress by covering or binding
= example: to dress by covering or binding
- to wrap around with something so as to cover or enclose
= example: to wrap around with something so as to cover or enclose
= synonyms: bind
